/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is flanked by buildings on both sides, their architecture hinting at the blend of modern and traditional styles that are characteristic of Beijing. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting shadows that add depth to the image. The colors are vibrant, with the greenery of the trees and shrubs contrasting against the urban landscape.
